---
title: Keybindings
sidebar:
  order: 2
---

<!-- auto-generated by sync-docs -->

## Session List (Main View)

### Navigation

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `↑` / `k` | Move cursor up (wraps to bottom) |
| `↓` / `j` | Move cursor down (wraps to top) |
| `PgUp` | Page up |
| `PgDn` | Page down |
| `g` | Go to top |
| `G` | Go to bottom |

### Session Actions

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `Enter` | Attach to selected session |
| `n` | Create new session |
| `x` | Kill session (with confirmation) |
| `R` | Rename session |
| `d` | Dismiss session (reset to working) |
| `r` | Refresh session list |
| `q` | Quit navi |

### Panels

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `p` | Toggle preview pane |
| `T` | Toggle task panel |
| `Tab` | Focus preview / task panel |
| `L` | Cycle preview layout (Side / Bottom / Inline) |
| `W` | Toggle preview line wrapping |
| `[` / `]` | Resize preview / task panel |

### Information

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `i` | Show metrics detail view |
| `G` | Show git detail view |

### Search and Filter

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `/` | Activate search mode |
| `0` | Clear all filters |
| `1` | Filter: waiting sessions |
| `2` | Filter: working sessions |
| `3` | Filter: permission sessions |
| `4` | Filter: done sessions |
| `5` | Filter: error sessions |
| `o` | Toggle offline sessions |
| `s` | Cycle sort mode |
| `f` | Cycle session filter (All / Local / Remote) |

## Search Mode

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| *(type)* | Filter by text (exact substring match) |
| `n` | Next match |
| `N` | Previous match |
| `Enter` | Confirm and exit search |
| `Esc` | Cancel and exit search |

## Preview Pane (Focused)

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `j` / `↓` | Scroll down |
| `k` / `↑` | Scroll up |
| `PgDn` | Page down |
| `PgUp` | Page up |
| `g` | Go to top |
| `G` | Go to bottom |
| `Tab` / `Esc` | Return focus to session list |
| `[` / `]` | Resize |
| `q` | Quit navi |

## Task Panel (Focused)

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `↑` / `↓` | Navigate tasks |
| `Space` | Expand / collapse task group |
| `/` | Search tasks |
| `Enter` | Open task (URL or file) |
| `r` | Refresh tasks (invalidate cache) |
| `s` | Cycle sort mode (source → status → name → progress) |
| `S` | Toggle sort direction (ascending / descending) |
| `f` | Cycle filter mode (all → active → incomplete) |
| `J` | Jump to next group header |
| `K` | Jump to previous group header |
| `e` | Toggle expand / collapse all groups |
| `a` | Toggle accordion mode |
| `T` | Close task panel |
| `Tab` / `Esc` | Return focus to session list |
| `[` / `]` | Resize |
| `q` | Quit navi |

## Content Viewer

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `j` / `↓` | Scroll down |
| `k` / `↑` | Scroll up |
| `PgDn` | Page down |
| `PgUp` | Page up |
| `g` | Go to top |
| `G` | Go to bottom |
| `Esc` | Close viewer |

## Dialogs (New Session, Rename)

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| *(type)* | Text input |
| `Tab` | Switch between input fields |
| `Enter` | Submit |
| `Esc` | Cancel |
